content: a small drawstring pouch that is approximately 5 tall with a base diameter of 3 5 it is the perfect size for jewelry trinkets travel-sized toiletries or a little purse it is worked up quickly and uses only simple stitches and you can make it in one solid color or however many you want it is a great pattern for burning through all of that leftover yarn you have this is the first pattern i have posted online of the few i have written so please let me know if there are any mistakes ~bunny
